creator: nicolas.mailhot@one2team.com
text:
When processing a medium-sized xml docbook document with ant's style task I hit
a java.lang.StackOverflowError.

Same document/xslt stylesheet/xslt processor combinaison works fine out of ant
in the commandline.

Tested both with xalan 2.2.D10 and saxon 6.4.4

Ant version is ant-1.4-2.noarch.rpm

That's a major bug for us since it forces manual processing of our documents
outside the automated ant build process

creator: sbailliez@apache.org
text:
I don't think there's much to do here, stack size is of course bigger than 
calling it via command line so this is really JVM tuning to me.

Did you try changing the stack size of Ant VM via -Xss ?
See java -X for more details

I'm setting this bug as fixed. In case it does not solve your problem, you can 
reopen it, but it would be nice to send some sample build.xml/docbook so that 
we can reproduce the problem easily.
